label: 文鏡秘府論
対訳語: A book on Chinese poems by Kūkai (Kōbō-Daishi) [空海、弘法大師]
本: Early Japanese History c. 40 B.C.-A.D. 1167,  Part B . Princeton University Press . 1937
説明文: This was the first attempt by a Japanese to discuss how to read and write Chinese poems (shi).  It had a great influence on the writing of poetry in Japan, and is particularly valuable in that it contains several passages from Chinese works on poetry that were early lost in China (Part A, p. 246). [詩]
